DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test two strategies to reduce the risk of contracting Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) or Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) by reducing risk behaviors in patients undergoing drug detoxification.
DOC.brief_title: HIV and HCV Intervention In Drug Treatment Settings - 1
DOC.criteria: Volunteers will be IV drug users already enrolled in drug detoxification treatment.
